text: The 2016 FIFA Puskás Award was the eight FIFA Puskás Award. It was awarded on January 9, 2017, during the The Best FIFA Football Awards 2016 in Zurich, Switzerland. Penang player Mohd Faiz Subri was the winner of the award, for his goal against Pahang during the 2016 Malaysia Super League season.
